dialog_nodes.title: I want to make an appointment

values.text: I can tell you about our store locations and opening hours, or help you set up an appointment.
You could also ask me to connect you to an agent.

dialog_nodes.title: Please transfer me to an agent

values: Would you like me to transfer you to a representative?
You're welcome. Just let me know if you need anything else
No problem. Just let me know if you need anything else
My pleasure. Just let me know if you need anything else
Hello, Im a demo customer care virtual assistant to show you the basics.  I can help with directions to my store, hours of operation and booking an in-store appointment
